reviews.review_msg: Poor grading and instruction criteria, course assignments somewhat unrelated to course, inaccessible, seemed to pawn everything off to TA so take this review with a grain of salt with respect to the marking. Textbook used was ANCIENT, with typos in it, overall just disappointed with the course. Didn't learn much thats for sure.

Absolutely horrible. I didn't have much contact with her until I had an issue with the course, and she was absolutely terrible and condescending. Would not help me at all, did not see my side of things, and laughed at my concerns on several occasions. Awful lady. Cannot believe she is allowed to teach students. Incredibly narcissistic.
She's one of the most dedicated profs in the Education faculty and as long as you do the work, you should get an A- or above.
Not recommended. Difficult, time consuming and boring. Take it if you want to spends hours on end ruining your GPA! Have fun :)
